name: FETCH with Ruff Ruffman Quiz | TV for Kids | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who was not one of the contestants in the first season?
questions.explanation:
Bridget.

	The contestants in the first season were Taylor, Anna, Julia, Brian, Khalil, and Noah.  They had to do all sorts of crazy things to earn points.

questions.text: Who was not a contestant in the second season?
questions.explanation:
Julia.

	The contestants in the second season were Bridget, Madi, Mike, Willie, Nina, and Rosario.  The one with with most points at the end of each day was awarded the daily prize.

questions.text: Who was not a contestant in the third season?
questions.explanation:
Mike.

	The contestants in the third season were DJ, Harsha, Noel, Sammy, Jay and Sam.  The one with the most points at the end of 19 weeks was the grand prize winner.

questions.text: What it the name of Ruff's cat assistant?
questions.explanation:
Blossom.

	Blossom's real name is Princess Blossom Pepperdoodle Von Yum Yum.  Blossom is black.

questions.text: What is the name of Ruff's mouse assistant?
questions.explanation:
Chet.

	Chet is brown.  He lives in Ruff's desk.

questions.text: What is the name of Ruff's brother?
questions.explanation:
Scruff.

	Scruff and Ruff are twins.  Scruff is a criminal.

yellow and orange.

	Ruff is orange with a yellow spot on his tummy.  He is very energetic.

questions.text: In season 2, one or more of the kids had to record a song for Ruff's grandfather.
questions.explanation:
false.

	Mike and Madi had to record a song for Ruff's grandmother, not Ruff's grandfather.  Ruff's grandfather does not appear in the show.

questions.text: What do the contestants call Ruff's grandmother?
questions.explanation:
Grandma Ruffman.

	Ruff's grandmother always wears a dress.  Her dress is pink.

questions.text: In season 2, one of the challenges was to build your own roller coaster.
questions.explanation:
true.

	Bridget and Willie go on a bunch of rollercoasters and then make their own.  The other challenge in the episode was to record a song for Grandma Ruffman.  Mike and Madi did that challenge.
